meanings.sent1: She misrendered the song lyrics and sang the wrong words.
meanings.sent2: The artist misrendered the landscape, making the mountains look too small.
meanings.sent3: The misrendering of the recipe turned the cake into a salty disaster.
meanings.sent4: His misrendering of the map led us to the wrong side of town.
meanings.sent5: The misrendering of the contract caused confusion and delays.

meanings.sent1: The misrendering of the document led to misunderstandings among the team.
meanings.sent2: The misrendering in the painting made the subject unrecognizable.
meanings.sent3: The misrendering of the joke made everyone laugh for the wrong reason.
meanings.sent4: Her misrendering of the play's ending left the audience puzzled.
meanings.sent5: The misrendering of historical events in the textbook confused the students.
